trends: There have been 5 other sightings in St. Louis
There were no other sightings in St. Louis on or around March 15th 2013
divs: Sighting Detailswhen looking up having a cig early in the morning a friend and I saw what looked like a row of birds flying in a formation but witnessed no wing movement and what looked like looping but the birdlike objects staying in perfect formation. I have seen it happen twice more later that night but moving in an east to west direction
Summary: looked like birds flying but no wing movement seen more than once
